EmailTemplate.subject: Register for Marathon Fleet Online for faster and easier fleet management
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Register for Marathon Fleet Online- www.marathonfleetcard.com/login
Registering is easy - Watch this quick guide: http://www.fleetcarddirect.com/distrib-userenroll/
Be sure to register for Marathon Fleet Online where you’ll find easy card and vehicle spending controls, reports highlighting ways to save, customized email alerts, and more:
•Add new cards or turn off lost cards in minutes
•Download receipt data to your accounting system
•No more chasing lost receipts or entering data
•Get email alerts to help manage on-time payment and avoid late fees
•Set purchase controls to help prevent unauthorized spending, including; fuel limits, allowable days and times, fuel type, and store or vehicle service charges
•View, download, or print last 12 months of reports
•Save time and simplify your life - Go Paperless: http://www.fleetcarddirect.com/tutorials/fleet-distributor.php
Marathon Station Locator ►http://mymarathonstation.com/StoreLocator Drivers can find the most convenient Marathon near them.
QUESTIONS? Customer Service is open to assist you and your drivers 24 hours a day, 7 days a week. 1-866-544-0699
